notes.title: What should I do after this project?
notes.content:
1 - Portifolio page
2 - Just apply to a job

notes.title: Bright mode
notes.content: The bright mode will come soon!

notes.title: Third note
notes.content:
I'm thinking about adding a new dependency to replace the textarea.
The ones that allow you to edit the text and save it the way you want.

notes.title: Bad request handling
notes.content:
Looks like it's much easier to handle bad request on the back-end perspective.
JSON-Server is pretty simple on the way it handles the GET requests that are not found. So I have to stick to just telling the user that there isn't a note with this ID and create a limit for 404 requests.
